nl.inl.blacklab.search

Class TextPatternSensitive

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.search.TextPattern
      • nl.inl.blacklab.search.TextPatternSensitive
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class TextPatternSensitive
extends TextPattern
    TextPattern for wrapping another TextPattern so that it applies to a certain word property. For example, to find lemmas starting with "bla": TextPattern tp = new TextPatternProperty("lemma", new TextPatternWildcard("bla*"));

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextPatternSensitive(boolean caseSensitive, boolean diacriticsSensitive, TextPattern input)
      Indicate that we want to use a different list of alternatives for this part of the query.

              QueryExecutionContext context)
        Description copied from class: TextPattern
        Translate this TextPattern into some other representation. For example, TextPatternTranslatorSpanQuery translates it into Lucene SpanQuerys.

        translate in class TextPattern
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of object to translate to

      • rewrite

        public TextPattern rewrite()
        Description copied from class: TextPattern
        Rewrite the TextPattern before translation. This changes the structure of certain queries so they can be executed more efficiently.
        Overrides:
        rewrite in class TextPattern
        Returns:
        either the original TextPattern (if no rewriting was necessary), or the rewritten TextPattern
